CSVReader¶

class CSVReader.CSVReader(group=None, target=None, name=None, args=(), kwargs=None, *, daemon=None)¶

Bases: reader.ReportReader.ReportReader

A reader for reading extracted reports in .csv files

read(filepath)¶

Reads a .csv file

Parameters

filepath (str) – The path to the .csv file

Returns

A list of reports contained in the .csv file

Return type

List[VFTReport]

readNumDb(row, eye)¶

Parses the data of a numerical dB graph to the format used inside the application.

Parameters

  • row (List) – A list of 76 values from a numerical dB graph.

  • eye (str) – The eye side.

Returns

A 10x10 2D list, representing the numerical dB graph.

Return type

List[List[str]]
